name: Cool As Ice
description:
Play as Mr. Block, who fell to the bottom of the freezer, and desperately needs to slide his way back to his love, Ms. Block.

Slide through 11 short levels to reunite the freezer-crossed ice cubes.

Controls: WASD/Arrow keys

Play time: Approx. 3 minutes

Why I made Cool As Ice

Being brand new to game dev, I needed a project to hone my skills.

I set out to build and complete a game.

A few months later, Cool As Ice is the completed product.

This release is a proof-of-concept.

I left ideas and mechanics on the table, stopping scope creep from killing this introductory project.

I will entertain a much-expanded, fully-featured release with powerups, traps, bigger levels and additional mechanics.

Please give me feedback and let me know if you would be interested in an expanded release.
